TopicTitle: I forgot to name this thing

Articles.Content:
Computer goes into Kernel Panic when trying to start KSP on MacOS Mojave

(Modded or not)

Pls help

Have you tried this?

Quote

The only way to load KSP is to right click the KSP application, "Show Contents," then navigate Contents/MacOS/ and run the KSP executable within. I can only imagine many Mac users have no idea they can even look inside applications.

Source: https://bugs.kerbalspaceprogram.com/issues/20479

It was reported for 1.5.1 but maybe it's still a thing in 1.6.0

Also, there is a thread pinned to this subforum just for mac users, maybe there is something useful in there:

Otherwise: Have you already tried something or is a log created?
